kahoot.buttonJoinGame.description: Used as the title for the button in Discord. {0} is the Game ID

kahoot.correctAnswer.description: Used when the user anwered correct on a question

kahoot.createHome.description: Used when the user is viewing the create.kahoot.it home page

kahoot.discover.description: Used when the user is viewing the discover page

kahoot.drumRoll.description: Used when a player is waiting to receive their final ranking

kahoot.editingCourse.description: Used when the user is editing a course. The name of the course will be displayed below.

kahoot.editingKahoot.description: Used when the user is editing a Kahoot. The name of the Kahoot will be displayed below.

kahoot.feedback.description: Used when a player is providing feedback about the quiz to the host

kahoot.firstPlace.description: Used to display who was first place in a game. {0} is a player name

kahoot.gameCreate.description: Used when a Kahoot Host is creating a Game

kahoot.gameOver.description: Used when the Game is finished

kahoot.gameStarting.description: Used when a Kahoot Game is starting

kahoot.gameSummary.description: Used when the host is viewing the summary of a game

kahoot.incorrectAnswer.description: Used when the user answered incorrectly on a question

kahoot.joiningGame.description: Used when a user is joining a Kahoot Game.

kahoot.kahootDetails.description: Used when the user is viewing the details of a Kahoot. The name of the Kahoot will be displayed below.

kahoot.kahootProfile.description: Used when the user is viewing the profile of a Kahoot user or group. The name of the Kahoot user/group will be displayed below.

kahoot.liveCourse.description: Used when the user is conducting a live course. A live course is a collection of activities that users interact with in real time.

kahoot.liveCourseActivity.description: Used to display the activity being conducted. {0} is the activity number and {1} is the activity name.

kahoot.loadingPage.description: Used when a page is loading

kahoot.login.description: Used when a user is logging in

kahoot.myCourses.description: Used when the user is viewing their own courses. A course is a collection of Kahoots and other activities.

kahoot.myKahoots.description: Used when the user is viewing their own kahoots

kahoot.ndPlace.description: Used in the context of 2nd place

kahoot.of.description: Used in the context of questions (i.e 1 of 3). {0} is the current question and {1} is the total amount of questions

kahoot.onPodium.description: Used in the context of a player/team being withing the top 3

kahoot.playing.description: Used as the first line when a user is answering a question

kahoot.points.description: Used to display how many points a user has. {0} is the number of points

kahoot.position.description: Used to display the position (ranking) of a player. For example, "Position: 2"

kahoot.previewingKahoot.description: Used when the user is previewing a Kahoot. The name of the Kahoot will be displayed below.

kahoot.questionLoading.description: Used when the next question is loading

kahoot.questionNumber.description: Used to show what question is currently showing (both host and user). {0} will be replaced with the string kahoot.of

kahoot.questionShowing.description: Used when the host is showing a question

kahoot.questionsCorrect.description: Used to display how many questions a user got correct

kahoot.rdPlace.description: Used in the context of 3rd place

kahoot.resultsQuestion.description: Used when a user is looking at the results of the question they just answered

kahoot.searchKahoots.description: Used when the user is searching for Kahoots. The search query will be displayed below.

kahoot.slideShowing.description: Used when the host is showing a slide from a Kahoot with content instead of a quiz

kahoot.slideViewing.description: Used when a user is looking at a slide with content in a Kahoot

kahoot.stPlace.description: Used in the context of 1st place

kahoot.teamTalk.description: Used when a player is talking to their team during team talk time

kahoot.topX.description: Used in the context of Top 5

kahoot.userReports.description: Used when the user is viewing their own game reports

kahoot.viewingCourse.description: Used when the user is viewing a course. The name of the course will be displayed below.

kahoot.waiting.description: Used when the user is waiting for a Kahoot Game to start

kahoot.waitingAnswer.description: Used when a player is waiting for the question results
